title: Large # of 1909 Obaks available for trade - correct list of cards w/ grades included
author: shammus

posts.post_title: Large # of 1909 Obaks available for trade - correct list of cards w/ grades included
posts.post_content:
I was very fortunate to be able to trade for a larger 09 Obak group recently.  I fully intend on going after the set again however I thought I'd offer a few of the cards up just in case I can make a little progress on one of my longstanding projects.  

Here are the Obaks that I have -


Baum SGC 20
Beall SGC 30
Bodie PSA 1
Brackenridge SGC 60
Brashear PR (heavy crease, paper on back)
Brown (horiz) SGC 70
Browning SGC 70
Cameron SGC 50
Carrol GD (corner wrinkle)
Dillon SGC 30
Eagan GAI 1
Easterly SGC 20
Ehman SGC 20
Fansing SGC 30
Flannigan SGC 40
Graney SGC 30
Haley SGC 30
Henley PR (hole punch)
Hitt SGC A
Hogan SGC 20
Howard SGC 20
LaLonge PSA 1
D. Lewis SGC 50
Martinke PR (not pretty)
McArdle GD/VG
McKune SGC 40
Melchoir SGC 30
Mohler FR (back damage)
Mundorff SGC 50
Murphy SGC 10
Nelson SGC 60
Ragan SGC 20
Raymer SGC 20
Smith SGC 40
Tennant SGC A
Wheeler SGC 20
R. Williams SGC 40
Willis VG (no creasing)
Zeider SGC 30


And this is what I need for them in return if I am to part with any - 

w590 (need 1) - Spencer
d311s (need 11) - Burrell, Daley, Delhi, Dillon, Gregory, Kuhn, Lewis, Maggert, Ryan, Tennant, Wares
t210 orange/pink/yellow borders - need any
eunc orange borders (need 18 - 12 commons) - Bergen, Bradley, Chase, Criger, Davis, Devlin, Doolan, Gibson, Laporte, Lord, McConnell and Miller....
1911 Zeenuts (need 10) - Bernard, Lindsay, Melchoir, Noyes, Pfyl, Rapps, Ryan SF, Smith SF, Stinson, Weaver
1918 Zeenuts - need any
1919 Zeenuts (need 11) - Lane (oak), Pinelli (sac), Prough (sac), Vance (sac), Spencer (saltlake), Seaton (SF), Smith, Bill (SF), Snell (SF), Arbuckle (Vern), Check (Vern), Meusel (vern)


Thanks in advance for the consideration.  Scans and condition descriptions for the 09 Obaks are available upon request.  Many of these are pretty nice and there's even a couple SGC 60s and 70s in this group.  

-Brian
[url]redmaccie@hotmail.com[/url]

Guys, my fault on this.  I posted the 1909 Obaks that I still NEED yesterday.  I corrected that mistake just now and up above are the actual cards I have with their conditions/grades listed out.  I apologize for that...

Since I've now posted the correct list with the actual grades, I thought that I'd add that if anyone wanted to upgrade an existing card they have with one of mine, that is fine too and we can work something out.  

I wondered why I was getting notes about Gandil....even when I was at work today and didn't have the list in front of me, I was thinking to myself "well gee, I know I don't have THAT card..."  :)

Still have most of these Obaks available.  Below is a more detailed wantlist if anyone is interested in trading.  Thanks much,
Brian
[url]redmaccie@hotmail.com[/url]


w590 (need 1) - Spencer 
 
w553s - need any 
 
d311s (need 10) - Burrell, Daley, Delhi, Dillon, Gregory, Lewis, Maggert, Ryan, Tennant, Wares 
 
t210 orange borders - need any 
 
e103s - need any common 
 
eunc orange borders (need 18 - 12 commons) - Bergen, Bradley, Chase, Criger, Davis, Devlin, Doolan, Gibson, Laporte, Lord, McConnell and Miller.... 
 
1911 Zeenuts (need 26) - Bernard, Bohen, Criger, Delhi, Fanning, Harkness, Henley, Hosp, Howard, Kerns, Kilroy, Knight, LaLonge, Lindsay, Melchoir, Mitze, Moore, Naylor, Noyes, Pfyl, Rapps, Ryan SF, Smith SF, Stinson, Weaver, Zamloch 
 
1918 Zeenuts - need any 
 
1919 Zeenuts (need 11) - Lane (oak), Pinelli (sac), Prough (sac), Vance (sac), Spencer (saltlake), Seaton (SF), Smith, Bill (SF), Snell (SF), Arbuckle (Vern), Check (Vern), Meusel (vern)
